channel.title: Server Please Help
channel.description:
Hello, I have posted this before but it was only commented on once any ways heres what happened
I was online my server was up an running, I know this because 30 people including my self were on it. My power went out due to a storm and when it came back on I tried to start the server again and the Run file says it's online but the webclient still says it's offline. If you can help it would be appreciated and you will be +Rep

item.title: Server Please Help
item.dc:creator: @escalation escalation
item.description:
@escalation wrote:

Start > search (windows firewall with advanced settings) > New rule > add in the port 43594 on TCP and UDP > turn OFF your firewalls > and it should work

Try that.

Read full topic
